channel.title: (never mind, delete this thread)
channel.description:
Hey, everyone.
So this map I've been slaving away at for months is randomly shitting on me when I cross a certain threshold in the map. It also doesn't seem to be outputting a minidump to help me diagnose the problem, either. Is there a newer place to look for crash dumps? As to what is causing the problem, I think possibly fade distances on some of my level's props might be fading simultaneously to the point where there's some kind of buffer overflow, but I'll have to do a lot of tweaking to confirm. Dropbox of map available on request.

item.title: (never mind, delete this thread)

item.description:

item.title: (never mind, delete this thread)
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Nothing sweetheart. I just think it is adorable the way you begged for help, but then apparently discovered the answer yourself and tried to cover it up by having a mod delete it? :s hrug: Sounds EXACTLY like something I would do. (call me the delete queen)
We should be best friends.

Read full topic
